__e: You know me, I'm up, up, up, then some fashion Nazi says pear-shaped people shouldn't wear stripes and whoosh, guess who's ear-deep in mint chocolate chip ice cream?
He does love mint chip, and so do I, but I don't think it's time for him to eat mint chip with the two of us together.
And as complicated as it is, as much as I lie to them, I... I still love them.
This is a time of crisis, and I think you need another scoop of mint-chocolate chip. Thanks.
I met my soul mate when I was 15 years old... and I have loved her every minute of every day... since I first bought her that mint chocolate chip cone.
I don't want to be lied to, and I can't live like that.
Maybe you need somebody who's going to lie to you... and tell you things like, "You got what it takes."
Look, I-I don't like being lied to and I don't like being played.
And with Roger, what you have to worry about is that he's lying to make himself worse than he actually was.
But if you want me to lie for you, I need some protection on this, so I have one condition.
How do you know he isn't making up stories to make you feel sorry for him?
